titleStmt.title: A tossed ship making to safe harbor, or, A word in season to a sinking kingdome wherein Englands case and cure, her burthens and comforts, her pressures and duties are opened and applyed : in diverse sermons preached upon the publick dayes of humiliation, out of that propheticall history, Matth. 14, 22 to 28 / by Samuel Bolton ...
titleStmt.author: Bolton, Samuel, 1606-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by L.N. for Philemon Stephens ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
The t.p. is torn and p. 7, 8, 24, 29, 30, and 66 are tightly bound in filmed copy. Pages from beginning-p. 75 photographed from Princeton Theological Seminary Library copy and inserted at the end.
